## Shape.UpperLeftColumn property

Represents upper left corner column index.

```csharp
public int UpperLeftColumn { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.UpperLeftColumn == 3)
    shape.UpperLeftColumn = 1;
```
